data.name: Vividerie
data.detailed_description:
Vividerie is a bullet hell roguelite that follows a group of heroes who run, shoot, dash and magic their way through hordes of vile creatures in order to cleanse the world of all that's evil. Select a character, fight your way through the dungeons and ensure that the world remains safe.

STORY
The world was once a beautiful and lively place, until a great disaster contaminated the lands. In its wake, long dead creatures are spontaneously resurrected, corrupting them in the process. Most parts of the world are forever tainted by the cataclysm, and there's no way to remove the corruption of the soil.
However, the creatures that appeared because of these events can be dealt with, and a few brave heroes have made it their duty to regularly visit those corrupted places and cleanse them, making the world a safer place.

Key Features

  • Procedural Generation - With 10 dungeons and the magic of procedural generation, no two runs are ever the same, allowing for endless hours of fun gameplay.
  • Choose How You Play - Pick one of 5 unique characters, plentiful skins, and a myriad of abilities.
  • Countless Items - Discover over 100 items that drastically alter the course of your run, and combine them in surprising ways to wreak havoc upon your foes.
  • Tough, but Fair - Vividerie is designed for players looking for a challenging, but rewarding experience.
